title: Language Learning App Development Project through Collaborative Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental smartphone utilization skills and general understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Experiential learning of language app design through collaborative activities, developing prototypes based on real-world usage scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can derive three core features of a language learning app through the collaborative design process
Learner teams can create app interface wireframes based on user experience (UX) principles
Participants can revise prototype design proposals at least once by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
